title: Test of Two Variances
text: By the null hypothesis that the variances are the same, the F statistic is $$\frac{{s_1}^2}{{s_2}^2}$$, where s would denote the sample variance.
speech: By the null hypothesis that the variances are the same, the F statistic is  fraction, s sub 1 squared, over, s sub 2 squared,  , where s would denote the sample variance.

, where s would denote the sample variance.

title: Test of Two Variances
text: Instructor 1's variance is $$52.3$$, and instructor 2's variance is $$89.9$$. divide instructor 1's variance with instructor 2's variance.
